posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for? JailRP Moderator

2) How old are you? (if you prefer to say this in private, just ask): REDACTED

3) Where do you live? (Country, time zone): Maryland, Eastern Time (GMT-5:00)

4) Current In-Game Name: MZP.inferno

5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community page: STEAM_0:1:24877865 and http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198010021459

6) Email Address: REDACTED@REDACTED

7) How long have you been involved (frequent player, moderator, donator, admin) with [NNJG] or Shadow's TTT/Flood/Jail/ server: Jail, about 2 months maybe, then i donated 20 bux, then another 3 months till now. Verrrrry frequent player ;D

8) What you can bring to the [NNJG] Team (Web/Graphic Design, Lua/other Coder, Moderation, Map Maker, ect.)?: JailRP moderation, i know almost all of the commands and probably 75% of the VIPs and frequent players on there too.
9) Why do you want to be part of the [NNJG]Team?: I feel that i could help the Jail server a lot, and make it more fun for everyone involved.

10 ) Any GMOD/TF2/CSS experience: GMOD-55.5 hrs / 479.6 hrs TF2-2.9 hrs / 2.9 hrs CSS-4.7 hrs / 15.9 hrs 

11) Have you ever owned a GMOD/TF2/CSS server?: Meh, not really. Co-owned one once, though.

12) Do you have a microphone? Do you frequently use it?: Yep and yep.

13) Any other Comments or information you can provide: Uhh, recommendations. Here ya go.
